exceptions.exn: In environment b : nat Hb : (2 <= b)%nat k : nat Hk : k <> 0%nat Hak : alpha_nat b k <> 0%nat m, n, l : nat Hm : m = (n + l * k)%nat Z2ZP_morph := Z2Zp_morphishm Hak : ring_morphism 0 1 Z.add Z.mul Z.opp (Zp_zero Hak) (Zp_one Hak) (Zp_plus Hak) (Zp_mult Hak) (Zp_opp Hak) (Z2Zp Hak) The term "m" has type "nat" while it is expected to have type "Z".

original: assert (H2m: 2 * m = 2 + (2 * (m - 1))) by lia. rewrite H2m. clear H2m. rewrite Z.add_comm. rewrite Z2Zp_plus. rewrite Z.add_comm. rewrite Z2Zp_plus. rewrite Z.add_comm. rewrite Z2Zp_plus. reflexivity.
